body_html:
I'm using:

Microsoft Visual Studio 2017 with Visual C++ toolset 2015 (v140)
Anaconda 4.1.1 (Python 3.5 64-bit)
swigwin-3.0.12
Cuda and Cudnn aren't applicable in this case
CMake 3.10.2
Windows 10, but the target platform is set to 8.1
